org.svvrl.goal.cmd
Class WhileStmt

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.cmd.WhileStmt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statement
public class WhileStmt
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statement

A WhileStmt represents a while-loop statement.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Constructor Summary
WhileStmt(Expression cond, Statement body)
          Constructs this while-loop statement with the loop condition and the loop body.
 
Method Summary
 void dump(int indent)
          Dumps this statement as a string on the standard output.
 void eval(Context ctx)
          Evaluates this statement under a specified context.

          throws EvaluationException,
                 BreakException,

Description copied from interface: Statement
Evaluates this statement under a specified context.

Specified by:
eval in interface Statement
Parameters:
ctx - the context for this evaluation
Throws:
EvaluationException - if there is an error during the evaluation
BreakException - if a break statement is evaluated during this evaluation
